headline: UP-Norfolk Southern Merger Would Control Nearly Half of US Rail Container Traffic
summary: A deal would shift container market leadership from BNSF to UP-NS, raising pressure on the former to seek out its own acquisition.

headline: In Our View: Railroad(s) merger ahead
summary: The business news last week was the announcement of a potential merger of two giant railroads. Union Pacific is considering acquiring or merging with Norfolk Southern. This could have potential impact in our area. Norfolk Southern has a strong presence in Portsmouth. They are also one of West Virginia’s two leading railroads. Meanwhile, Warren Buffett’s BNSF Railroad may be in talks with CSX ...

headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC) Q2 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Freight transportation company Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC) will be announcing earnings results this Tuesday morning. Here’s what to expect.
